message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards. It comes packed with features that promise unparalleled performance and efficiency. Given its quality and capabilities, I believe it would be an invaluable asset to you. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to purchase it for $15000. This is a special offer tailored to ensure you receive the best possible deal while securing your interest in this exceptional product.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the quality of your product, $15000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time. I'm interested in your product, but I'd be willing to pay $12000.  Would you be willing to consider that price?
